src:
Lewat KOBI, Timnas MMA Indonesia Mampu ke Kancah Dunia
07 Nov 2019, 02:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sejarah baru ditorehkan Komite Olahraga Beladiri Indonesia (KOBI) dengan mengirimkan timnas Bela Diri Campuran (MMA) ke kejuaraan MMA amatir dunia. Event yang digelar Federasi Bela Diri Campuran Internasional (IMMAF) bertajuk 2019 IMMAF-WMAAA Unified World Championship Amateur MMM itu akan berlangsung di Khalifa Sport City, Isa Town, Manama, Bahrain, pada 11-16 November 2019.
Untuk mendapat hasil maksimal, KOBI melakukan proses seleksi tingkat nasional sejak Agustus lalu. Lima atlet siap dikirim ke ajang tersebut, dan akan bersaing dengan ratusan petarung dari berbagai negara.
Lima atlet yang berhasil terpilih itu di antaranya Budi Setiawan (kelas Senior Fly weight), Rendi Anjar Kusuma (kelas Senior Bantam weight), Edi Erlangga (kelas Senior Bantam weight). Dua lainnya yakni Toby Prasetya (kelas Junior Light weight) dan Firman Muharram Syach (kelas Junior Bantam weight).
"Alhamdulillah, KOBI berhasil mengukir sejarah lagi sebagai organiasi MMA pertama yang mengirimkan atlet MMA amatir nasional berlaga di kejuaraan MMA amatir dunia," ujar Ketua Umum KOBI, Ardiansyah Bakrie.
"Semoga kita dapat mengharumkan nama Bangsa di kejuaraan MMA amatir dunia '2019 IMMAF â€“ WMMAA Unified World Championships Amateur MMA'," katanya menambahkan.

text:
Through KOBI, MMA Indonesia National Team is able to go to the world stage
Nov 7 2019, 02:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - New history is inscribed by the Indonesian Martial Arts Committee (KOBI) by sending the Mixed Martial Arts national team (MMA) to the world amateur MMA championship. The event which was held by the International Mixed Self-Defense Federation (IMMAF) titled 2019 IMMAF-WMAAA Unified World Championship Amateur MMM will take place at Khalifa Sport City, Isa Town, Manama, Bahrain, on 11-16 November 2019.
To get maximum results, KOBI conducted a national-level selection process since last August. Five athletes are ready to be sent to the event, and will compete with hundreds of fighters from various countries.
The five selected athletes included Budi Setiawan (Senior Fly weight class), Rendi Anjar Kusuma (Senior Bantam weight class), Edi Erlangga (Senior Bantam weight class). The other two are Toby Prasetya (Junior Light weight class) and Firman Muharram Syach (Junior Bantam weight class).
"Alhamdulillah, KOBI succeeded in making history again as the first MMA organization to send national amateur MMA athletes competing in the world amateur MMA championship," said KOBI Chairperson, Ardiansyah Bakrie.
"Hopefully we can make the name of the Nation in the world amateur MMA championship '2019 IMMAF - WMMAA Unified World MMA Amateur Championships'," he added.
